sub_fields.label: Plans Panel Visibility
sub_fields.name: show_plans_panel
sub_fields.instructions: Unchecking/disabling this option will not print/display the Plans Panel and values of the following fields will be disregarded.

sub_fields.label: Package Table Columns
sub_fields.name: package_columns
sub_fields.instructions: Please input titles for the Contract Table Columns

sub_fields.label: Package Table
sub_fields.name: packages
sub_fields.instructions: There's no validation on the values or prefix/suffixes. Values will be printed as is.

sub_fields.label: Package ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: ID of this package by which it'll be recognized on the signup link.

sub_fields.label: Upsell Copy
sub_fields.name: upsell_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Upsell Copy is printed after the Package Table. Example content "Larger Customer? Check Our Volume Pricing"

sub_fields.label: Package Type
sub_fields.name: package_type
sub_fields.instructions: Unique identifier for this plan which is recognizable by the signup form.

sub_fields.label: Tailored Panel Visibility
sub_fields.name: show_tailored_panel
sub_fields.instructions: Unchecking/disabling this option will not print/display the Tailored Panel and values of the following fields will be disregarded.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, the CTA section will be center aligned.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: Supported video formats: Youtube, Vimeo and self hosted (HTML5)

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: heading
sub_fields.instructions: Wrap text in <span></span> to give it the alternating color.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: video_url
sub_fields.instructions: Supported video formats: Youtube, Vimeo and self hosted (HTML5)
